title: Implement tsk migrate in Python
description: Implement migrate command: read .beads/*.jsonl, convert to project/issues/*.json, map status to workflows.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

custom.beads_notes:
Plan: implement tsk migrate in Python with strict Beads JSONL parsing, mapping to Taskulus issues, and Behave steps; run Behave and parity checks.
Implemented Python migration: taskulus/migration.py and CLI tsk migrate; added Behave steps for migration and fixture-based tests; migration feature un-wip. Tests: cd python && python -m behave; python tools/check_spec_parity.py.
custom.beads_close_reason: Python migration implemented with CLI command and Behave steps; scenarios passing.
